Package simu.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
simu.controller.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
Serves as the main controller for the simulation, managing UI interactions, simulation parameters, car data, and the execution of the simulation.

      public javafx.scene.control.TextField dealerShipName

  • Constructor Details

    • MainController

      public MainController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the UI components by setting up sliders, car type listeners, car set listeners, table view listeners, car types, fuel types, car sets, and animation view.

    • setupSliders

      public void setupSliders()
      Configures the sliders for various parameters and sets their value listeners to update corresponding labels with formatted values. Uses setupSlider as utility method.

    • setupSlider

      public void setupSlider(javafx.scene.control.Slider slider, javafx.scene.control.Label label, String suffix)
      Configures a single slider with a value listener to update its associated label with the current slider value and a suffix.
      Parameters:
      slider - The slider to configure.
      label - The label to update.
      suffix - The suffix to append to the slider value.

    • setupCarTable

      public void setupCarTable()
      Configures the TableView for displaying car data.

      Key tasks:

      • Maps table columns to data indices (e.g., car type, fuel type, price).
      • Adds a styled "Delete" button for row deletion, updating both the TableView and carsToBeCreated list.
      • Fetches and populates car data from the database.
      • Enhances UI with hover effects for the "Delete" button.

    • handleStartSimulation

      public void handleStartSimulation()
      Starts the simulation by initializing parameters, creating cars, saving presets, and starting a new thread for the simulation. Also updates the UI logs to display progress.

    • changeSimulationSpeed

      public void changeSimulationSpeed()
      Changes the simulation speed dynamically based on the value of the simulationSpeedSlider. Adjusts the simulation speed in the engine adjusting sleep time value.

    • setTestDriveServicePoints

      public int setTestDriveServicePoints()
      Calculates the total number of test drive service points based on the number of cars to be created and returns the value.
      Returns:
      The total number of test drive service points.

    • updateUI

      public void updateUI()
      Continuously monitors the simulation progress by updating UI components with real-time data, such as simulation time, speed, and customer statistics.

    • results

      public void results()
      Summarizes and displays simulation results in the console log.

      Key tasks:

      • Stops the animation and updates the UI.
      • Logs simulation end time, total processed customers, and their data: arrival/removal times, service durations, car preferences, budget, credit score and purchase status.
      • Calculates and displays averages for all customers.
      • Logs statistics for car preferences, sold percentages by type and fuel, and car-fuel combinations.
      • Lists remaining and sold cars with pricing details.

    • saveResultsToCsv

      public void saveResultsToCsv(String fileName)
      Saves customer data, car preferences, fuel preferences, and simulation results to various CSV files under the SimulationResults directory.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The base file name for saving results.
